sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
epic_coverage: Core Calculator & UI Framework,User Account & Data Persistence,Advanced Electronics Modes,User-Extensible Functionality
key_deliverables: Responsive UI shell, Core scientific calculation engine, Ohm's Law calculator, Backend endpoints for all user data (Users, History, Vars, Custom Modes), Cognito setup, JWT validation.
demo_objectives: Demo the responsive layout on mobile/desktop. Perform complex scientific calculations. Use the Ohm's Law calculator.
success_criteria: Core calculator is fully functional and responsive. All foundational backend APIs are deployed and protected.
risk_factors: Underestimation of backend setup complexity. Initial setup of CI/CD pipeline for a new project.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize critical path backend tasks. Use established templates for CI/CD pipeline.

sprint_goal: Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
epic_coverage: User Account & Data Persistence,Core Calculator & UI Framework
key_deliverables: User registration flow, User login flow (OAuth PKCE), Protected routes, Basic offline functionality via service worker.
demo_objectives: Register a new user account. Log out and log back in. Access the calculator while offline.
success_criteria: Users can register and log in. Offline mode for the core calculator is functional.
risk_factors: Complexity of implementing OAuth PKCE flow correctly. Service worker caching can be difficult to debug.
mitigation_strategies: Follow security best practices for OAuth. Use a library like Workbox to simplify service worker management.
integration_windows: Frontend auth flow integration with Cognito.

sprint_goal: Deliver the complete Custom Mode creation wizard and the secure backend for custom code execution.
epic_coverage: User-Extensible Functionality (Custom Modes),User Account & Data Persistence
key_deliverables: Multi-step custom mode creation wizard with real-time validation. Secure AWS Lambda for formula execution using isolated-vm. Account deletion UI.
demo_objectives: Walk through creating a new custom mode from start to finish. Demonstrate the account deletion confirmation flow.
success_criteria: A user can create a valid custom mode and it is saved to their account. The secure Lambda is deployed and tested for vulnerabilities.
risk_factors: RISK-002: Sandbox escape vulnerability in the Lambda is a critical security risk. Complexity of the real-time formula validation UI.
mitigation_strategies: Rigorous security code review for the Lambda. Allocate extra time for frontend development of the wizard.
integration_windows: Frontend wizard integration with backend custom mode API.

sprint_goal: Enable users to launch and securely execute their created custom modes, completing the custom mode feature loop.
key_deliverables: Dynamic UI for launched custom modes. Management screen to list and launch modes. Backend execution endpoint.
demo_objectives: Launch a previously created custom mode. Enter values and get a calculated result. Show the management screen.
success_criteria: The end-to-end flow of creating, listing, launching, and using a custom mode is fully functional.
risk_factors: RISK-005: Lambda cold starts could impact performance. Complexity of rendering a dynamic UI from a JSON definition.
mitigation_strategies: Implement provisioned concurrency for the Lambda. Use a well-structured component design for the dynamic UI.
integration_windows: Full E2E integration of the custom mode feature.

sprint_goal: Implement the full offline data synchronization mechanism for a resilient user experience.
key_deliverables: Offline API interceptor and IndexedDB queuing service. Background sync service with conflict resolution logic.
demo_objectives: Go offline, create several history items/variables. Go back online and show the data syncing successfully. Demonstrate a conflict resolution scenario.
success_criteria: Offline changes are reliably queued and synced upon reconnection without data loss.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Data loss or corruption due to flaws in sync logic. RISK-003: High complexity leading to timeline underestimation.
mitigation_strategies: Extensive E2E testing with network manipulation. Allocate the entire sprint to this feature. Pair programming on critical logic.
